Art By Skylee

Featured

Services

Service 1

Small pencil portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

Service 2

Small colored pencil portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

Service 3

Small watercolor/gouache portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

Service 4

Small to large scale paintings. I offer only acrylic paintings in this service at this time. Message me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price, duration, and subject matter.

Service 5

Digital line work only (Tattoo designs) Discussion of size, intricacy, and placement is required.

Service 6

Full color digital (Tattoo designs) Discussion of size, intricacy, and placement is required.

Service 7

Small digital portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

Service 8

Custom polymer clay earrings (Sculpted and painted by hand)

Service 9

Custom resin earrings
